component.name: LSFG‑VK Launcher
component.summary: Launch Flatpak and host apps with Lossless Scaling frame‑gen (lsfg‑vk)

description.p: A minimal GTK4/Libadwaita launcher that starts other Flatpaks and host apps with the proper lsfg‑vk environment variables (multiplier, flow scale, performance mode, HDR and present mode override).
Add host apps support; icon pack; distribution helpers.
